<!-- enter ZIP code, Postcode, Post code, Postal code... --> |postal_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Quimistán''' is a [[municipality]] in [[Santa Bárbara Department]] of [[Honduras]]. ==Notable people== Honduras football international [[Mauricio Sabillón]] was born in Quimistán. {{Santa Bárbara Department}} {{coord|15|21|N|88|24|W|display=title|region:HN_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}}
